poem:
"AI's Ripe Red Wheelbarrow"

So much depends
upon
a sleek AI,
scarlet as Johansson's 
charm,
programmed beneath 
the gaze of OpenAI.
Mira's modern promise,
faster, friendlier,
unrolling in the minds
of men.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "If Scarlett Johansson can’t bring the AI firms to heel, what hope for the rest of us? | John Naughton On Monday 13 May, OpenAI livestreamed an event to launch a fancy new product – a large language model (LLM) dubbed GPT-4o – that the company’s chief technology officer, Mira Murati, claimed to be more user-friendly and faster than boring ol’ ChatGPT. It was also more versatile, and multimodal, which is tech-speak for being able". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: If Scarlett Johansson can’t bring the AI firms to heel, what hope for the rest of us? | John Naughton On Monday 13 May, OpenAI livestreamed an event to launch a fancy new product – a large language model (LLM) dubbed GPT-4o – that the company’s chief technology officer, Mira Murati, claimed to be more user-friendly and faster than boring ol’ ChatGPT. It was also more versatile, and multimodal, which is tech-speak for being able
